channel.title: Simple enough question
channel.description: ok so right now i want to add 3 of my own skills to my server. Trimming, Repairng, and upgrading. So, i was wondering what the new skills have to be as the level. like if you look in a tutorial, it says to add like "int playerLevel[24]" or something like that. but since i want to put multiple skills, instead of [24] what tould the new numbers be?

item.title: Simple enough question
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok sorry for the confusing grammar. if i want more than one custom level, instead of case 24: //Trimming sendFrame164(6263); sendFrame126("Congratulations, Your Trimming Level is now "+playerLevel[24]+" .", 4885); sendMessage("You advanced a Trimming Level!"); NpcDialogueSend = true;

would it be ok if i switched it to like 27, like this:

case 27: //Repairing sendFrame164(6263); sendFrame126("Congratulations, Your Repairing Level is now "+playerLevel[27]+" .", 4885); sendMessage("You advanced a Repairing Level!"); NpcDialogueSend = true;

Read full topic

item.title: Simple enough question
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

24 25 and 26… not that hard

Read full topic
